/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a bustling city street, bathed in the soft glow of daylight. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun casting a bright light that illuminates the scene below. The street is a hive of activity, with several cars in motion, their colors muted under the sunlight. A few pedestrians can be seen strolling along the sidewalk, adding a touch of life to the urban landscape.

On either side of the street, tall buildings rise, their facades a mix of modern and traditional architecture. The buildings on the left side of the street are taller and more modern, their glass and concrete structures reflecting the sunlight. In contrast, the buildings on the right side are shorter and more traditional, their brick and stone facades adding a touch of history to the scene.

The street itself is lined with trees, their leaves a vibrant green against the urban backdrop. Streetlights stand sentinel along the sidewalk, ready to bathe the street in light as dusk falls. The image is taken from a low angle, giving a sense of looking up at the towering buildings and the expansive sky.
